agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Texas Ports, Select TIME & DATE: 1:30 PM or upon adjournment Wednesday, March 6, 2019 PLACE: E1.028 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Brandon Creighton The Senate Select Committee on Texas Ports will meet to consider and adopt the Committee rules and conduct any other organizational business deemed necessary by the Chair. Testimony will be heard on the economic impact that inland waterways and coastal ports have on the states economy and receive updates on recent port activity. If submitting written testimony, please submit 10 copies with your name to the Committee during the hearing. All witness registration will be done electronically. All oral testimony will consist of only invited testimony.
